channel.title: 90% guthans and barrows help

item.title: 90% guthans and barrows help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

i just added guthans onto my server because the jad mini game was near imposible without it, this is what i have, i need to make a timer or a randomizer to select when the special will go off.
heres the code

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) {
animation(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
}

if anyone could help me it would be greatly appricated.

im also trying to add a barrows minigame to my server, is there a way to kill a certan npc and get a “kill count” point for it? i know ive seen it but i dont know what i would do to get it. if anyone would help me it would be greatly appriciated.

~red_rooster
